snippet: A Cattelan billboard for the High Line; a moonscape for Arles; Dargers for the Museum of Modern Art.
abstract: Carol Vogel Inside Art column; image created by Maurizio Cattelan along with photographer Pierpaolo Ferrari is on display next to the High Line in Chelsea; exhibition To the Moon Via the Beach, experiment by group of 20 international artists, will be on view in Arles, France; three sculptures by Ellsworth Kelly will occupy the atrium of the Morgan Library & Museum from June to September; Museum of Modern Art acquires 13 double-sided drawings by Henry Darger.
lead_paragraph: A Cattelan billboard for the High Line; a moonscape for Arles; Dargers for the Museum of Modern Art.
